name: Gravity (itch) (lethen1)
description:
A poorly made game made in 2hours and 28mins

yes i am that bad at making games i dont know why i make games but

You are a cadet on his first day that has will power and can float around space on your own command your goal is to destroy any nearby battle spheres without health reaching zero. oh also theres health scattered around the level and the level is random every time

Controls:

WASD to move and click on the spheres to destroy them run in to the health packs to pick them up
